name: Departure (itch) (MunchDuster123)
description:
MADE IN UNDER 72 HOURS

[Press O to increase sensitivity and P to decrease it, press E to pickup or interact]

[You start a pistol and 5 grenades, press 3 to equip the grenades].

You have entered the undead airport, 

Trying to get to the last departure for the safe zone.

Make it to the plane or die trying.

Use 1, 2 and 3 to switch between weapons.

There are four sections of the map, each requiring money to advance, money is gained from re-deading the undead. 

Watch out for CRAWLERS!

Also, if you are on windows, the windows downloadable build has less lag as a result of not having browser restrictions.
